metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13231 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Cacti before 1.2.11, auth_profile.php?action=edit allows CSRF for anadmin email change.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13231` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
